geometry

Class VertexGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometry.VertexGenerator

  • public class VertexGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    generates the vertices of any shape/solid etc if the vertices can be obtained by adding an element of the power set of the direction vectors to the offset

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3[] generate()
        Returns:
        generated vertices

      • generate

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3[] generate(int minDirVecs,
                                       int maxDirVecs)
        Parameters:
        minDirVecs - minimum number of direction vectors to use
        maxDirVecs - maximum number of direction vectors to use
        Returns:
        generated vertices obtained by adding at least minDirVecs direction vectors to the offset and at most maxDirVecs direction vectors

      • addUp

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3[] addUp(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3>> addSet)
        Parameters:
        addSet - list of lists, each containing the vectors to be added to offset
        Returns:
        array of vectors, each being the sum of the offset and an element of addSet. Note: addSet is not modified, new vectors are being constructed
